oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thomas W. Steele and John Jay Hooker, Jr. at breakfast honoring Nicholas Katzenbach, 1962 April 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: Hon. Thomas Wardlaw Steele (left) with Nashville attorney John Jay Hooker, Jr. at a breakfast honoring Nicholas Katzenbach. The event was held at Judge Weldon White’s (Justice Tennessee Supreme Court 1961-1967) on April 27th, 1962. Katzenbach served in the U. S. Department of Justice as Assistant Attorney General of the Office of Legal Counsel in 1961-1962 and as Deputy Attorney General from 1962 to 1965. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Katzenbach, Nicholas deB. (Nicholas deBelleville), 1922-2012; Steele, Thomas W., 1921-1994; Hooker, John Jay, b. 1930
